extension_description.message: Tanthauzirani mawu osankhidwa patsamba lawebusayiti ndikusintha kukhala mtundu womwe mwasankha.

turn_off_description.message: Batani lomasulira lidzawonekera nthawi iliyonse mawu akasankhidwa

turn_on_description.message: Batani lomasulira silidzawoneka mawu akasankhidwa koma mutha kumasulirabe podina chizindikiro cha Pro Translate pazida zothandizira

auto_switch.message: Sinthani zokha ku chilankhulo chachiwiri chomwe mukufuna

auto_switch_description.message: Mawu osankhidwawo akakhala chilankhulo chomwe mukufuna, masulirani kukhala chilankhulo chachiwiri

target_format_description.message: Sankhani mtundu womwe mukufuna, mtundu ukhoza kusinthidwa mugawo lomasulira

auto_set_format_description.message: Mukasintha mtundu mu gulu lomasulira, ikani mtundu wosankhidwa kukhala mtundu wosasintha

format_and_order.message: Mtundu wa gulu lomasulira ndi dongosolo

format_and_order_description.message: Mawonekedwe amomwe angasinthidwe pagawo lomasulira ndi dongosolo lowonetsera

translate_button_on_description.message: Batani lomasulira lidzawonekera nthawi iliyonse mawu akasankhidwa

translate_button_off_description.message: Batani lomasulira silidzawoneka mawu akasankhidwa koma mutha kumasulirabe podina chizindikiro cha Pro Translate pazida zothandizira
